name: Compsognathus
description: A bipedal dinosaur about the size of a small cat.  Its teeth and claws look quite sharp.

name: Gallimimus
description: A feathered bipedal dinosaur, standing as tall as a human.  It looks somewhat like a reptilian ostrich.

name: Titanis
description: It looks like a dodo, only much bigger, with longer, muscular legs and a predatory gleam in its eyes.

name: Spinosaurus
description: A huge dinosaur about the size of a small house, with a ferocious crocodile-like head and a sail on its back.

name: Triceratops
description: A massive rhino-like dinosaur with a bony crest from which three large horns emerge.

name: Stegosaurus
description: A large quadruped dinosaur with plates on its back, and a spiked tail.

name: Ankylosaurus
description: This dinosaur looks like a giant prehistoric armadillo.  Its tail ends in a massive spiked club of bone.

name: Allosaurus
description: A large predatory bipedal dinosaur, with tiger-like stripes on its broad back.

name: Eoraptor
description: A bipedal dinosaur about the size of a chicken.  It roots around the undergrowth, scavenging on small animals and plants.

name: Velociraptor
description: A small bipedal dinosaur covered with feathers.  Small, hooked claws emerge from its feet and hands.

name: Deinonychus
description: A medium-sized bipedal dinosaur covered with feathers.  At the end of each foot is a large sickle-like claw.

name: Utahraptor
description: A large bipedal dinosaur with feathered arms, a long tail, and scythe-like claws.

name: Parasaurolophus
description: A huge mottled dinosaur with a blunt head crest.  It contentedly strips leaves from a nearby shrub.

name: Dimorphodon
description: A small flying reptile, circling overhead looking for prey.

name: Dilophosaurus
description: A medium dinosaur with a sticky green bile dripping from its teeth.
